articles.title: Collingwood Pub The Gem Is Up for Sale - Broadsheet
articles.description: The business is listed for around $400,000 – Elvis shrines, cowboy boots and old-school pinball machines included.
articles.content:
Collingwood's The Gem is up for sale. 
It's the second well-loved Collingwood pub to hit the market in recent months, following the nearby Gasometer Hotel which was listed in April.

articles.title: Qualcomm reveals mid-range Snapdragon 690 with 5G, Wi-Fi 6, and 120Hz support - Android Police
articles.description: Qualcomm revealed the budget Snapdragon 768G just last month, but now the company is announcing another System-On-a-Chip intended for mid-range devices.
